name: Renewable Energy Installer
description:
Renewable Energy Installer is the industry's voice, publishing breaking news online through our website and Twitter, with the monthly magazine bringing analysis and detailed features.

For over four years we have brought the latest news, opinions and technologies that have driven the renewables market and our reputation continues to grow, being the only magazine supported by MCS.

From solar PV to air source heat pumps, wind to biomass, Renewable Energy Installer covers the whole microgeneration market.
